hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #5# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Bow#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path of time.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Wallet#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Broken Sword# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Hookshot#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Eyeball Frog#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Eyeball Frog#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: This hint is in another castle.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Wallet#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: I've heard Sploosh Kaboom is a tricky game.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Lower Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.
